query:
UPDATE workflows
               SET name = $2, description = $3, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
               WHERE id = $1
               RETURNING
                id as "id!: Uuid",
                project_id as "project_id!: Uuid",
                name,
                description,
                created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
